timeline.bodyText: Why did you loosen this check to ignore incorrect filenames?

replies.bodyText:
That was not intentional. reverted.
Since some of the test pdscs are in resources/external, the package was different when being translated. But I used custom tasks with paths configured correctly. Forgot to remove this change.
replies.author: karthikbalasub
